text:
Akvo Foundation – Several positions – Amsterdam, Helsinki, London, Stockholm

UX designer

Product manager

Technical account manager

Help desk coordinator

Senior technical consultant

Senior devops engineer

http://akvo.org/about-us/working-at-akvo/

Akvo creates and runs open source internet and mobile services that make it easy to bring international development work online. We focus on project dashboards and making data easier to collect, visualise & share. Headquartered in Amsterdam, Akvo is a non-profit foundation that works with more than a thousand organisations around the world. Currently, we have 59 staff located in hubs in Amsterdam, London, Stockholm, Delhi, Bangalore, Nairobi, Ouagadougou and Denpasar, as well as other locations.
